author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Sundial Group launches ‘Risk-Free Guarantee'’
text:
Sundial Group launches ‘Risk-Free Guarantee'’ Sundial Group launches ‘Risk-Free Guarantee'’ Details Category: Venues & Events   11:00 Sundial Group has launched a Risk-Free Guarantee for all conference and event bookings at its three country house venues. The award-winning hospitality group that owns Highgate House in Northamptonshire, Woodside in Warwickshire and Barnett Hill in Surrey, invites all new customers to book with confidence, safe in the knowledge that they will receive first class service across the board. 
In the unlikely event that the service they receive at their chosen venue does not meet their expectations, Sundial guarantees to refund 100% of their booking costs. Director of Sales, Mia Butler said: “Choosing a meeting venue for the first time can be a very daunting experience. As experts in events, we promise an exceptional service and want to give all our prospective customers the peace of mind in knowing they will get the best from us and that we are a totally risk-free choice.” Related articles
